com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Interface BleDevice.ReadWriteListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GenericListener_Void<BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent>
    Enclosing class:
    BleDevice
    Deprecated. 
    - Refactored to ReadWriteListener. This class will stay until version 3.0, when it will be removed.

    public static interface BleDevice.ReadWriteListener
extends GenericListener_Void<BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent>
    Provide an implementation of this callback to various methods like BleDevice.read(UUID, ReadWriteListener), BleDevice.write(UUID, byte[], ReadWriteListener), BleDevice.startPoll(UUID, Interval, ReadWriteListener), BleDevice.enableNotify(UUID, ReadWriteListener), BleDevice.readRssi(ReadWriteListener), etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent
      Deprecated. 
      Provides a bunch of information about a completed read, write, or notification.
      static class  BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.Status
      Deprecated. 
      A value returned to GenericListener_Void.onEvent(Event) by way of BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent.status() that indicates success of the operation or the reason for its failure.
      static class  BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.Target
      Deprecated. 
      The type of GATT "object", provided by BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent.target().
      static class  BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.Type
      Deprecated. 
      The type of operation for a BleDevice.ReadWriteListener.ReadWriteEvent - read, write, poll, etc.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.GenericListener_Void

        onEvent
